General.Name: Guangdong Meiyan Jixiang Hydropower Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Guangdong Meiyanjixiang Hydropower Co.,Ltd. generates hydroelectric power in China. The company operates hydropower stations with an installed capacity of 151,000 kilowatts. It also offers education services. In addition, the company is involved in manufacturing, big data, and geographic information planning industry. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Meizhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Yanjiang South Road, Meizhou, China, 514787
